title: Genetically engineered wheat releases insect pheromones to ward off pests

tasks.task: Research and development of gene-modified crops for pest control
subtasks: Collect genetic material from peppermint plant
Modify crops to insert gene for producing aphid pheromones
Test synthetic pheromones using olfactometer
Observe aphid behavior in response to engineered plants
Document wasp attraction to engineered plants
Conduct field trials with gene-modified wheat
Monitor aphid and beneficial insect populations
